name: Long Zest
preparation:
This house cocktail at Scotland’s Glenmorangie House is meant to serve as an introduction to scotch. It’s an Old Fashioned–style formula of whisky, bitters and a flamed orange peel turned into a sipping-friendly long drink with the addition of Fever-Tree ginger ale.

Add the scotch and bitters into a rocks glass over ice, and stir.

Top with the ginger ale, flame an orange peel to express the oils, then add as a garnish.
